Container.Name: amd
Container.Description: Automated Music Downloader :: AMD is a Lidarr Companion script to automatically download and tag music files for use in various media applications
Container.Overview: Automated Music Downloader :: AMD is a Lidarr Companion script to automatically download and tag music files for use in various media applications

Config.Name: Music Download Location
Config.Description: Destination location for temporary downloaded files :: IMPORTANT!!! lidarr needs access to this directory...

Config.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Config.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Config.Name: Lidarr Url
Config.Description: Set domain or IP to your Lidarr instance including port. If using reverse proxy, do not use a trailing slash. Ensure you specify http/s.

Config.Name: Music Download Client ARL Token
Config.Description: User token for dl client, for instructions to obtain token: https://notabug.org/RemixDevs/DeezloaderRemix/wiki/Login+via+userToken

Config.Name: Music Download Quality
Config.Description: FLAC or 320 or 128 :: 320/128 are MP3 downloads, FLAC is lossless...

Config.Name: Musicbrainz Mirror URL
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Only change if using a different mirror

Config.Name: Musicbrainz Rate Limit
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: musicbrainz rate limit, musicbrainz allows only 1 connection per second, max setting is 10
